reviewText: My little one loves Noodle and Doodle!
My daughter loves this show. It is too bad it went off the air. Great program teaching kids cooking, sharing, recycling, crafting, and thinking of others. Full of fun easy crafts and snack ideas.
Love the video my granddaughter loves it!
This is a great DVD for boys and girls!  We have used many of the ideas from it, and the kids especially love the cooking segments!
I'm not sure where my daughter heard about this show ,but it is quite fun. We have done every project on the show and it has helped my little one try a bunch of new foods. Good show great times.
I bought this product for my granddaughter. She loves it and wants to watch it all the time.  Great purchase!
My daughter loves this show and I didn't want to watch the same shows over and over. I would recommend this product to anyone.
